hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Specialized in React, TypeScript, PHP, and Laravel. Passionate about creating modern and efficient web solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my background and experience
about.description_1: I'm a web developer with experience in frontend and backend technologies. My passion for programming began during my studies in Web Application Development, and since then I've worked on various projects that have strengthened my technical skills.
about.description_2: I'm currently enrolled in the 42 Barcelona program, where I continue to expand my knowledge in programming and software development. My goal is to create efficient, scalable web applications with an excellent user experience.

responsibilities.monitoring_grafana: Monitoring with Grafana and restart of virtualized environments
responsibilities.deployments_kubernetes: Hot deployments in high availability and Kubernetes environment management
responsibilities.internal_apps: Internal application development with PHP, JavaScript, and Bootstrap

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of my featured work
projects.project_vipfootball_desc: Web application developed with Laravel for football league management, allowing users to check information about teams and matches. Full-stack development with REST API and Railway deployment.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's connect and build something great together
contact.cta_message: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels. I'm always open to discussing new projects and opportunities!
